about_the_game:
Control Mori and her origami simultaneously through the Japanese spirit realm!

Morigami's Gameplay focuses on puzzle solving through teamwork. One half of the controller let's you control Mori, the other her companion - a living origami, which she can fold into different forms with varying abilities. On the quest to find Moris little sister, they need to combine their strengths and make their way through the Japanese spirit realm.

Experience a heartfelt story

After the strange disappearance of Mori‘s sister at the hands of an evil spirit, she relies on the Japanese belief of folding 1000 origami cranes to make a wish: Having her sister back. Thus, the 1000th origami comes to life with the purpose of supporting Mori on the journey to her little sister. Throughout their travels, many mysteries about Mori‘s past and the connection to her origami companion are uncovered.

Explore Morigami's unique game world


Traverse a visually appealing landscape
Inspired by Japanese woodblock prints, the game creates an eye-catching and aestetically pleasing low-poly-style environment.

Get immersed in the world of Japanese yokai
Travel through the Japanese spirit realm with help of the various yokai you meet along the way - all based on real creatures and legends of the Japanese mythology. Interact with them through light-hearted dialogues and get to know their unique personalities.

Unlock new origami forms
Throughout the game, new Origami Forms are unlocked by obtaining a folding instruction scroll. With a special variety of abilities, the different origami forms aid in puzzle solving. For this, Mori can refold the Origami into a different form at any time.
